name: Dipity
short_description:
Dipity is a free digital timeline management website enabling publishers to
organize the web content by date and time.
long_description:
Dipity is a management platform for publishers to organize articles, blog posts,
pictures, videos and other content. Interactive views show are used for anything
from online news features to museum kiosks. Dipity allows customers to work with
content directly or automatically pull highly relevant content from
socially-curated sites like YouTube, Wikipedia, Digg and others using RSS and
API integrations. Once created, the interactive tools stays up-to-date, and can
be embedded in blogs, social networks, and websites to add an interactive,
engaging element to any site.
